items.title: Racially charged row between Musk and South Africa over Starlink
items.description: The tech billionaire is embroiled in a row with the government over black empowerment legislation.

items.title: Watch: Biden attacks Trump in first speech since leaving White House
items.description: The former US president says his successor has "done so much damage and so much destruction" in his first days in office.

items.title: India's Gandhis charged in money laundering case amid opposition outcry
items.description: India's financial crimes agency has accused the Gandhis of illegally acquiring properties of a newspaper.

items.title: China appoints new trade envoy in face of tariff turmoil
items.description: The shift comes as Beijing refuses to back down in an escalating trade war with Washington.

items.title: US pastor kidnapped during church service in South Africa found after shoot-out
items.description: Three people died in the "high-intensity shootout" that led to Josh Sullivan's rescue, officials say.
